item.title: LeetCode 342. Power of Four 解題紀錄
item.author: Author
item.description: 檢查 $n$ 是否為 4 的次方。Check $n$ whether it is a power of four or not.

item.title: LeetCode 326. Power of Three 解題紀錄
item.author: Author
item.description: 檢查 $n$ 是否為 3 的次方。Check $n$ whether it is a power of three or not.

item.title: LeetCode 67. Add Binary 解題紀錄
item.author: Author
item.description: 兩個字串進行二進位數值加法，並回傳字串。Given two binary strings a and b, return their sum as a binary string.

item.title: LeetCode 1822. Sign of the Product of an Array 解題紀錄
item.author: Author
item.description: 取得所有數字乘積的正負號。Get the sign of product of all values in the array nums

item.title: LeetCode 2. Add Two Numbers 解題紀錄
item.author: Author
item.description: 兩組以 Linked List 方式儲存的數字進行加總。Add the two numbers and return the sum as a linked list.

item.title: LeetCode 412. Fizz Buzz 解題紀錄
item.author: Author
item.description: 給定一個 array，依照指定規則代換語詞。Given an integer $n$, return a string array answer (1-indexed).

item.title: LeetCode 976. Largest Perimeter Triangle 解題紀錄
item.author: Author
item.description: 以現有長度組合出最大面積的三角形。Return the largest perimeter of a triangle with a non-zero area, formed from three of these lengths.

item.title: LeetCode 204. Count Primes 解題紀錄
item.author: Author
item.description: 請計算整數 n 以內有幾個質數。Given an integer n, return the number of prime numbers that are strictly less than n.
